infos.name: small kitchen
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a small kitchen. An ordinary one.

 You see [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] garbage can.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The garbage can contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You see a kitchen pantry.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The kitchen pantry contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The kitchen pantry is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can make out a fridge.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The fridge contains [a list of things in the c_2]![end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You can see a sink.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The sink contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The sink is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can make out a dining table. [if there is something on the s_0]You see [a list of things on the s_0] on the dining table.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]The dining table appears to be empty. Hm. Oh well[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden door leading west.

infos.name: small bedroom
infos.desc:
You've entered a small bedroom. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You can make out a bedroom cabinet.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The bedroom cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The bedroom cabinet is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can see a wardrobe.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The wardrobe contains [a list of things in the c_5]![end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The wardrobe is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You see a writing desk. The writing desk is usual.[if there is something on the s_1] On the writing desk you make out [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if] You can see a sofa. I guess it's true what they say, if you're looking for a sofa, go to TextWorld. The sofa is normal.[if there is something on the s_2] On the sofa you can make out [a list of things on the s_2]. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the sofa! oh well.[end if] You see a bed. The bed is standard.[if there is something on the s_3] On the bed you can see [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] The bed appears to be empty. You move on, clearly infuriated by your TextWorld experience.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden door leading east.

infos.name: wooden door
infos.desc: The wooden door looks hefty. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: garbage can
infos.desc: The garbage can looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: kitchen pantry
infos.desc: The kitchen pantry looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: fridge
infos.desc: The fridge looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: sink
infos.desc: The sink looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: bedroom cabinet
infos.desc: The bedroom cabinet looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: wardrobe
infos.desc: The wardrobe looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: bag of cookies
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that standard thing.

infos.name: computer monitor
infos.desc: The computer monitor is antiquated.

infos.name: dining table
infos.desc: The dining table is reliable.

infos.name: writing desk

infos.name: sofa

infos.name: bed
